title: PT 3: She's On The Verge Of Busting Her Husband's Mistress, But *This* Is Holding Her Back
description:
Imagine going through your husband's Facebook messages and finding out that he's been having an affair! Not only is he cheating, but he's cheating with a mutual friend!
This happened to our listener and she was torn between telling the mistress' husband or not. What did she do? We have an update! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
